meanings.definition: In a way that is not required or mandatory.
meanings.sent1: You can optionally wear a hat to the party.
meanings.sent2: She optionally decided to bring her umbrella just in case.
meanings.sent3: The cat optionally chose to nap in the sun instead of chasing mice.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed optionally, adding a touch of color to the garden.
meanings.sent5: The students could optionally complete the extra credit assignment for bonus points.

meanings.definition: With the possibility of choosing to do something or not.
meanings.sent1: You can optionally join us for dinner later.
meanings.sent2: He optionally selected the blue shirt instead of the red one.
meanings.sent3: The dog optionally wagged its tail when offered a treat.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled optionally in the night sky, creating a magical scene.
meanings.sent5: She optionally decided to take a different route to work today.
